section.title: Modules
section.para: Most of the extensions will be of the form of function libraries. Each module is an independent, consistent piece of the whole project, addressing a particular issue or feature area.

primary.title: HTTP Client
primary.para: This is the first module defined so far. It has not been adapted to the work-in-progress EXPath formalism yet, but is available on its legacy page for now. Any thought about how it should be released as part of EXPath would be much appreciated on the mailing list.
